title: Justice Department reverses course on defending Trump in E. Jean Carroll case
description: The DOJ backed off of its earlier position that Trump was acting within the scope of his presidential duties when he made “crude and disrespectful” comments about Carroll.

title: Georgia grand juries impaneled as Trump probe decision looms
description: A Georgia judge seated two grand juries that will likely be tasked with deciding whether to bring election interference charges against Trump and his allies.

title: 'We will lose talent': Gen. Brown warns of damage to military from GOP senator’s block on promotions
description: Gen. Brown, Biden’s pick for Joint Chiefs chair, says Tommy Tuberville’s block on military promotions could damage the force and push some to leave the service.

title: Discord bans AI-generated child sex abuse material and teen dating
description: Discord's head of trust and safety said that the popular chat app was changing and clarifying its policies around grooming, teen dating and child sexualization.

title: Manson family killer Leslie Van Houten freed on parole
description: Leslie Van Houten, a follower of Charles Manson who was convicted in two killings, was released on parole Tuesday, according to officials.

title: Jury decides 2014 document found in Aretha Franklin's couch is a valid will
description: A document handwritten by singer Aretha Franklin and found in her couch after her 2018 death is a valid Michigan will, a jury said Tuesday, a critical turn in a dispute that has turned her sons against each other.

title: Trump denounces Biden's decision to send cluster munitions to Ukraine
description: Donald Trump condemned President Joe Biden's decision to send cluster munitions to Ukraine, warning that it could lead to World War III.

title: Triple-digit temperatures persist across Southwest as heat dome expands
description: Severe heat continues to build in Arizona and across the Southwest, with conditions in Phoenix threatening to become the city’s longest heat wave on record.

title: California company Lumentum accused of anti-Asian bias
description: Former executive Andre Wong has filed a $20 million lawsuit accusing tech giant Lumentum of anti-Asian bias and discrimination. KNTV's Robert Handa reports.

title: 6-year-old Florida girl fights off abductor and escapes by biting his arm, authorities say
description: A 6-year-old girl was briefly abducted last week at a Miami apartment complex, but managed to get away by biting her attacker’s arm, authorities said.

title: Coco Lee's death prompts discussion in China around concealed mental illness
description: The recent death of Coco Lee, a critically acclaimed international singer and songwriter, has prompted much-needed discussions around mental health in China, many social media users are saying.

title: Randy Travis' stagehand shot dead by wife over alleged affair, Nashville police say
description: A former stagehand for country star Randy Travis was allegedly shot dead by his wife on Sunday because she believed he was having an affair, according to police.

title: Inflation has cooled off dramatically since last summer, but 'back to normal' is still a long way off
description: By one measure, the U.S. economy is already close to slaying the price inflation that has bedeviled it for the better part of two years.

title: Microsoft-Activision deal moves closer as judge denies FTC injunction request
description: A federal judge in San Francisco has denied the Federal Trade Commission’s motion for a preliminary injunction to stop Microsoft from completing acquisition of video game publisher Activision Blizzard.

title: PGA Tour officials grilled about highly scrutinized merger with Saudi-backed LIV
description: PGA Tour officials grilled about highly scrutinized merger with Saudi-backed LIV

title: Shop these tech deals as big retailers slash prices
description: Prime Day, Amazon’s annual shopping event, is offering big deals and lots of products — but they’re not the only retailer offering bargains. Lifestyle expert Amy E. Goodman joins TODAY with a roundup of some of the items with discounts, including a Ring camera bundle, laptops and more.

title: Threads hits 100M users amid showdown with Twitter
description: Threads, the new social media platform from Mark Zuckerberg’s Meta, has gained 100 million subscribers in less than a week. NBC’s Jacob Ward breaks down its similarities to Twitter as the two tech giants continue their high-profile showdown.

title: Comedian Sarah Silverman sues Meta and OpenAI for copyright infringement
description: Comedian Sarah Silverman has filed a lawsuit against social media giant Meta and OpenAI that claims they’re using her content without permission to make their apps work better. NBC News legal analyst Danny Cevallos explains what Silverman and two other authors are alleging and whether the suit could create more opportunities for content creators to take legal action against social media companies.

title: Disgraced Theranos founder Elizabeth Holmes' prison sentence shortened by 2 years
description: Elizabeth Holmes, the founder of the blood-testing lab Theranos, appears to have had her prison sentence shortened by roughly two years, according to federal records.

title: Amazon Prime Day 101: How to find the best deals
description: Tuesday kicks off Amazon Prime Day offering deals to shoppers of the online retailer. NBC’s Brian Cheung joins TODAY on tips for saving extra money and avoiding scams.

title: Biden confronts a 'pissed-off generation' of young voters who may be decisive in 2024
description:
Pollster sees warning signs for young voter turnout 
as President Joe Biden seeks re-election against his likely 2024 opponent, former President Donald Trump.

title: Microsoft to lay off more employees months after letting 10,000 workers go
description: Microsoft confirmed Monday that it’s eliminating additional jobs, a week after the start of its 2024 fiscal year.

title: 'Life-threatening' floods slam Vermont as torrential rains pound New England
description: 'Life-threatening' floods slam Vermont as torrential rains pound New England

title: Ukraine tops Biden's agenda at key NATO meeting with alliance set to expand
description: Ukraine tops Biden's agenda at key NATO meeting with alliance set to expand

title: Trump's lawyers tell judge they oppose starting classified docs trial in December
description: Lawyers for former President Donald Trump asked a federal judge Monday to delay a criminal trial over Trump’s alleged mishandling of classified documents until after next year’s presidential election.

title: Northwestern head football coach fired after hazing investigation
description: The head coach of Northwestern University's football team was fired Monday after an investigation into allegations of hazing among team members.
